sentence.Network_en: Five large pieces of the wall are currently on exhibition in London.
sentence.Network_cn: 那堵墙的5块大碎片眼下正在伦敦展出。

sentence.Network_en: We sat down in the shade of the wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在墙根的背阴处坐下。

sentence.Network_en: We took refuge in the lee of the wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在墙的背风处暂避.

means.word_mean: 1. herb that grows in crevices having long narrow leaves and small pink apetalous flowers

auth_sentence.content: On the other side of the wall are corporations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the other side of the wall are corporations.

auth_sentence.content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
